name: Cursed Duality
description:
Cursed Duality

The game has been made in 72 hours during the LudumDare#49 gamejam.
The theme was : Unstable

Cursed Duality is a 2D Vertical Platformer mixed with twisted Puzzle features game.

Story (if there is one ?)

It’s 36XXX and Slimes dominate this world once ruled by foolish bipedal mammals. Using top of the line technology, the Slimes shaped a way to regulate the Earth ecosystem. For centuries the Slimes lived happily and prosperously under the warm protection of their machine, but it has recently GONE WRONG.
The chosen one, a particularly brave Slime, is sent in an infinite quest to solve the issue.

Gameplay

A vertical platformer with a ‘slight’ twist (Match3) where you’ll have to balance between scoring, risk taking and surviving.

As you start climbing the tower, the game will automatically start to scroll toward the top. With your ability to move, jump and stomp, you will have to climb the tower through unstable blocks.

The blocks you step on might crumble, so you will want to not stay idle for too long. If you fall too far below the death line, you (the Slime) will lose control of itself and die.

As the blocks crumble, a Gem, that was supposed to maintain the Earth’s ecosystem, will fall down. By making many gems fall, if you align 3 or more of them, it will make them explode. Exploding the gems have a chance to start catastrophic events, but this is the only way to, hopefully, fix the machine. (Also, this is how you earn score points)

Climb as much as you can while puzzling through the gem blocks !

Keyboard Controls
  • Movement : ↑←↓→ | WASD
  • Jump : SPACE
  • Stomp : SPACE + ↓ on air
  • Pause the game : ESCAPE
  • Navigation In Menu : Use ↑←↓→ | WASD to navigate and SPACE to confirm

The mouse is disabled, use the keyboard to navigate through menus.

Xbox Controller Controls
  • Movement : ↑←↓→
  • Jump : A
  • Stomp: A + ↓ on air
  • Pause the game : ESCAPE
  • Navigation In Menu : Use ↑←↓→ to navigate and A to confirm
